ai.summary: Cnoc Trail is a short 2.4 km easy hike in the UK, ideal for beginners and families seeking a quick outdoor escape.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily a well-maintained footpath with gentle gradients. Surfaces are mainly grassy or gravel, with occasional uneven patches, and some muddy sections after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Check local conditions before you go. Wear sturdy footwear and stay on marked paths. Bring water and weather-appropriate clothing. Be mindful of changing weather in the UK, carry a map or GPS, and tell someone your plans. In low light, consider a headtorch; if you have small children or pets, supervise closely.
recommended_gear: Map or GPS device / smartphone with offline map
Emergency contact information and a charged phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly April to October) offer the most comfortable conditions for this trail, though it can be enjoyed year-round with suitable gear.

seo.title: Cnoc Trail – 2.4 km Easy Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the family-friendly Cnoc Trail, a 2.4 km easy hike in the UK. Learn about the terrain, safety tips, and gear to enjoy this short outdoor walk.
